actions.name: receiveMessage
actions.description: Receive a message in any channel of a server when he starts with our parameter

reactions.name: sendMessage
reactions.description: Send a message in a specific channel of a server

actions.name: pullRequest
actions.description: Someone makes a pull request on the repository

reactions.name: send_message
reactions.description: Send a message to specific channel in a slack server

actions.name: create
actions.description: Someone creates a file in the user's dropBox

actions.name: delete
actions.description: Someone deletes a file in the user's dropBox

actions.name: rename
actions.description: Someone renames a file in the user's dropBox

actions.name: createFolder
actions.description: Someone creates a folder in the user's dropBox

actions.name: move
actions.description: Someone moves a file in the user's dropBox

actions.name: countdown
actions.description: Triggers X min after the start

actions.name: loop
actions.description: Triggers X min after the start and it infinitely
